themes.description: Requests for new functionalities, investment options, or enhancements to existing features within the app.
Feedback related to the app's design, ease of navigation, intuitiveness, and overall user satisfaction with the interface.
Issues related to managing user accounts, personal information, KYC, and profile settings within the application.
Concerns related to personal data management, privacy, KYC processes, and the ability to control personal information within the app.
Feedback related to the results of investments, including gains, losses, or general sentiment about investment performance.
Concerns related to data privacy, app security, and protection of user information.
Concerns related to company ethics, unfair policies, forced account creation, and regulatory compliance.
Suggestions for new functionalities, tools, or improvements to existing features within the application.
Requests or feedback related to existing or new features, data availability, and overall app functionality for trading and analysis.
Issues related to account opening, KYC verification, demat account setup, and initial registration processes.
Concerns related to account security, unauthorized transactions, alleged fraud, scamming, or data breaches.
Covers feedback related to the ease of use, intuitiveness, and overall user experience of the application.
This theme covers complaints about the ease of use, design, and overall user experience of the application's features and processes.
This theme covers feedback related to the availability, functionality, and display of trading-specific features and information within the application.
Covers complaints or suggestions related to the app's design, layout, navigation, and overall user experience.
This theme covers concerns about the platform's legitimacy, reliability, and trustworthiness, including accusations of fraud or being a fake application.
Requests or issues related to accessing personal account details, trading history, or financial reports.
Covers complaints related to the application's user interface, design, ease of use, or overall user experience.
This theme covers issues related to the application's performance, display, or functionality across different devices, operating systems, or screen sizes.
This theme covers feedback and requests related to the availability of specific investment products, services, or financial instruments within the platform.
Suggestions for new features related to stock analysis, financial trends, company quality, and risk management information.
Requests for new types of investments, such as US stocks, foreign currency, or other asset classes not currently available.
Reviews expressing general satisfaction or positive sentiment about the app's overall experience.
Reviews requesting new features or complaining about the absence of expected functionalities.
Overall user satisfaction, general positive feedback, or comments on the platform's core functionality and usability.
General positive or negative comments about the app's overall experience, design, or recent updates that don't fit specific problem categories.
Concerns related to the application's design, navigation, layout, ease of use, and overall user experience.
This theme covers requests for new reporting tools, performance tracking, or analytical features related to investment strategies and account data.
This theme covers requests for new or improved ways to display market data, indicators, or specific information within the application's interface.
This theme covers issues related to the quality, format, professionalism, and content of generated statements, reports, and other official documents.
This theme covers issues related to investment results, such as IPO allotments, fund performance, or specific investment product outcomes.
This theme covers feedback related to the initial setup, registration, and account creation process within the application.
Reviews alleging fraudulent activity, scam behavior, or significant financial losses due to the platform's perceived unfairness or manipulation.
This theme covers feedback related to the platform's user interface, available features, design changes, and overall usability.
This theme addresses feedback related to the security of the platform, data protection, and user account safety.
This theme covers issues related to unauthorized actions on user accounts, incorrect trade executions, or discrepancies in account management.
This theme covers issues and feedback related to the account opening, activation, and verification processes.
